Object Flight Path: Path with directional change,Path then hovering
divs: Sighting DetailsI was outside and I got a similar object to last night the vanished the same way and then I looked in the school yard and noticed two insanely bright white lights in the woods shinning at me and they shut off my camera when I went too zoom in on them. I checked out the area but couldn't find anything, as soon as I walked back to my house a helicopter flew over the area of the woods I was in.
Summary: I saw a ufo like last night, vanished then noticed very bright lights in the tree line
